data.name: Cyberstorm Demo
data.detailed_description:
Cyberstorm is a game made by our own internal studio, and it looks and feels like that: awe-waitforit-SOME and fun-as-heck.

It’s a casual PvP shooter with robots that are made of cardboard. It is a twin-stick mayhem with no hard-to-learn mechanics, no building, and everything is made by ourselves (yeah, that’s why the SFX kick ass).

In Cyberstorm anyone can host a game, and decide the rules, and the size of the arena. Cyberstorm is what happens when you make babies with Fortnite and Among Us.

Features

  • Weapons include laser swords, ricocheting machine guns, hand guns, and a lot of more epic turrets!
  • Enter the arena, kill others and try to avoid getting killed!
  • A full-on-mayhem with arcade style fun
  • Hilariously thrilling with friends and foes

data.short_description: Twin-stick arcade style shooter which doesn't take itself too seriously. Challenge your friends in an online deathmatch arena to see who will stand victorious! Cyberstorm has a constantly growing selection of arenas to play, along with an epic selection of weapons to destroy your opposition with!
